# title

**Instance Property**

The localized string containing a description of the charge.

## Declaration

```swift
var title: String! { get }
```

## Discussion

This property contains a user-readable string describing the purpose of the charge. For example, it might contain the string “Base fare” or “Per-mile charge”. Siri and Maps display this information separately from the price information.

## Getting the Line Item Information

- **price**: The cost value of the line item.
- **currencyCode**: The ISO 4217 currency code that applies to the price information.

items.description: The cost value of the line item.
items.name: price

items.description: The ISO 4217 currency code that applies to the price information.
items.name: currencyCode

title: title
